default_coupon.label: Default Price Rule Coupon Code
default_coupon.comment: Use API tag %%%%#couponCode%%%% within your message in Bronto. You are responsible for ensuring the Shopping Cart Price Rule is active and valid, or else it may appear blank.

default_recommendation.label: Default Product Recommendation
default_recommendation.comment: Inject related product content in the message. Recommendations are created in Promotions » Bronto Product Recommendations

default_send_flags.label: Default Send Flags
default_send_flags.comment:
Specify the default send flags for all transactional emails. The options are:
- Sender Authentication: Will sign your message with DomainKeys/DKIM, optimizing your message delivery to Hotmail, MSN, and Yahoo! email addresses.
- Fatigue Override: The delivery can be sent even if it exceeds the frequency cap settings for a customer.
- Reply Tracking: Will store a copy of all replies to your messages on the Replies page within the Bronto platform.
